SOURCE SYSTEM: CX-AO-DEV-02

actions.name: Set Variables
actions.title: Use WF ID based on Name

properties.display_name: Use WF ID based on Name

properties.result_message: You must provide WF ID or WF Name.

properties.script:
import sys,json
full_json = sys.argv[1]
var_values = json.loads(sys.argv[2])
var_defs = (json.loads(full_json))['input_variables']
for definition in var_defs:
    if definition['properties']['name'] in var_values:
        definition['properties']['value'] = var_values[definition['properties']['name']]
output=json.dumps(var_defs)

properties.result_message: You must include a payload or input json.
